name: Kadambam
description: Kadambam is a real estate website that brings architectural charm to the digital space. Designed for a Coimbatore-based builder, the site is clean, mobile-responsive, and visually engaging.
highlights: Built with React and Tailwind for speed and responsiveness
Deployed on a live domain for a real-world client

name: TODO Task Collabaration App
description: A clean and intuitive Task Management Dashboard built for organizing daily to-dos. It supports task creation, updates, real-time status tracking, and team collaboration to boost productivity.
highlights: Task Management: Create, update, and track tasks in real-time
Team Collaboration: Assign, comment, and share tasks easily
Intuitive UI: Clean and user-friendly design for productivity

name: TrendThreads
description: TrendThreads is a modern e-commerce website showcasing trendy fashion products. Built with fundamental web technologies, it's ideal for exploring frontend UI creativity.
highlights: Responsive product layout with hover animations
Built using HTML, CSS, and vanilla JavaScript
Hosted live for a seamless shopping experience

name: CookIT
description: CookIT is a full-stack digital agency platform tailored for tech services. Designed to present services, receive leads, and showcase past works, it blends frontend appeal with backend power.
highlights: End-to-end flow using React, Node.js, and MongoDB
Dynamic project section and contact functionality
Structured backend with Express and Mongoose

name: YouTube Clone
description: This educational YouTube clone was developed to master DOM manipulation and JavaScript fundamentals. It mimics the core UI of YouTube with a clean and responsive layout.
